title: VR-Based Science Experiment Design and Interactive Learning Process

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic science theories at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Course for in-service secondary teachers to strengthen practical competencies in science experiment design. Practice-centered education in VR environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can design more than three science experiment environments using VR simulation tools
Through interactive quizzes, learners can analyze scientific variables in experimental design with 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate the educational effectiveness of experimental design proposals using a four-level assessment scale through peer evaluation and feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
